"Zaži na Považí is a project of the Regional Association of Towns and Villages of" "Central Považie, which was created by the civic association Sivý vlk, o. from" "The project includes an interactive map, a website with useful information and tips" "for the trip, and a mobile application." "\n\nThe map itself contains interesting places from 176 municipalities that are members" "of RVC Central Považie. In addition to cultural, historical and natural monuments," "you can also find tourist attractions, gastronomic facilities and accommodation options" "on the map. There are also cycle paths for active people."
